Name: East Meets West Julep
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & pomegranate seeds.
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Reminiscent of honeyed Mint Julep with pomegranate fruit.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2008 by Nidal Ramini at Montgomery Place in London, England. The contentious history of the Julep , along with its variants can be found on our page.
